  overlay: {
    position: 'fixed',
    top: 0,
    left: 0,
    backgroundColor: '#8aabb499'
  },
  content: {
    position: 'absolute',
    top: '50%',
    left: '50%',
    transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)',
    maxWidth: '600px',
    width: '100%',
    height: '200px',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    border: '1px solid #ccc',
    background: '#fff',
    overflow: 'auto',
    WebkitOverflowScrolling: 'touch',
    borderRadius: '4px',
    outline: 'none',
    padding: '20px'
  }
};

sourcesContent:
export default {
    overlay: {
      position: 'fixed',
      top: 0,
      left: 0,
      backgroundColor: '#8aabb499'
    },
    content: {
      position: 'absolute',
      top: '50%',
      left: '50%',
      transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)',
      maxWidth: '600px',
      width: '100%',
      height: '200px',
      display: 'flex',
      flexDirection: 'column',
      alignItems: 'center',
      justifyContent: 'center',
      border: '1px solid #ccc',
      background: '#fff',
      overflow: 'auto',
      WebkitOverflowScrolling: 'touch',
      borderRadius: '4px',
      outline: 'none',
      padding: '20px'
    }
  };
